ygData.subject: RE: [The EverQuest Tavern] EQ was down
ygData.msgSnippet: Hey Beverly!!  I can t believe all the changes they made too!!  There are some new drops in GE as well (a couple guildies checked it out last night).  They say
ygData.messageBody:
Hey Beverly!! I can't believe all the changes they made too!! There
are some new drops in GE as well (a couple guildies checked it out last
night). They say the revamped GE is really cool. Makes it easier to
hunt with a group and not having to necessarily RAID in there...



You going to join us on FV by chance? :-)



-----Original Message-----
From: Beverly [mailto:beverlyreed2002@...]
Sent: Wednesday, August 27, 2003 4:32 PM
To: theeverquesttavern@yahoogroups.com
Subject: [The EverQuest Tavern] EQ was down



Have you seen the new changes to the zones last night??? Two servers
were still down and the GMs in chat were saying the lost all
characters, but, everything was fixed!

I think it is an attempt to get people to re-visit the zones we
already have, and, give updates to people who don't buy the
expansions as well. Traps were added where they weren't before, some
mobs were given more AC and hitpoints, I think it is mainly for the
upcomming expansion (we both ordered ours).

HAPPY HUNTING... and check out the quests, for those who are EXP
geared the quests have been updated and new ones added for those of
you who cruz other servers starting over again to make EQ fun again
(like I do). Starting over on a new server reminds you of what a TRUE
NEWBIE is... LMAO!
